Id.description: Unique identifier for this object. Sort order is ASC by default.

SyncToken.description: Version number of the object. It is used to lock the object for use by one app at a time.

PrintStatus.description: Print status of the credit memo.

TotalAmt.description: Total amount of the credit memo.

HomeTotalAmt.description: Home total amount of the credit memo.

Line.description: Individual line items of a transaction. Valid Line types include SalesItemLine, GroupLine, DescriptionOnlyLine (also used for inline Subtotal lines), DiscountLine and SubTotalLine (used for the overall transaction)

Id.description: Unique identifier for this object. Sort order is ASC by default.

Amount.description: The total amount of the line item. This is the quantity multiplied by the unit price.

Description.description: A description of the line item.

DetailType.description: The type of detail for the line item. Valid values include SalesItemLineDetail.

value.description: The ID for the referenced object as found in the Id field of the object payload. The context is set by the type of reference and is specific to the QuickBooks company file.

name.description: An identifying name for the object being referenced by value and is derived from the field that holds the common name of that object. This varies by context and specific type of object referenced. For example, references to a Customer object use Customer.DisplayName to populate this field. Optionally returned in responses, implementation dependent.
